content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: crimson_fence_gate
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 4, "index": 15}, {"type": "dead_bubble_coral", "quantity": 32, "index": 16}, {"type": "twisting_vines", "quantity": 18, "index": 20}, {"type": "white_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 14, "index": 32}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "leather_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft a crimson_fence_gate I need 4 sticks and 2 crimson_planks. I will first move the sticks into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 15 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 2 with quantity 1
